forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 22. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 27. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of the day unfold over Boston, the air carries a brisk chill, whispering of the winter's grip on the landscape. The low temperature caresses the surroundings, hovering just above the low twenties, while a west wind, robust and spirited, stirs the city. The night, cloaked in partial cloudiness, reveals itself through the scattered glimmers of urban lights, painting the warmth of home among the cool dark. The gusty winds, at times reaching up to 37 mph, underscore a sense of lively unrest, a reminder that even in still silence, nature breathes vigorously.

As dawn breaks and gives way to Tuesday, expect a gradual unveiling of the sky as it transforms into a canvas of muted blues. The sun will stretch its golden rays, pushing temperatures toward a moderate embrace of the high twenty-sevens. The wind, while slightly tamed, will still cascade by, a companion for those venturing outdoors. To navigate this day pleasantly, layering will be your ally; a warm coat, sturdy boots, and a knit scarf will guard against the brisk breezes. Perhaps a stroll through the local park or a visit to a quaint cafe where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee dances in the air could provide the perfect antidote to the winter chill. With a day promising partly sunny skies, it invites leisurely moments and small joys, whether wrapped in the solitude of a good book or engaging in conversation with a friend.
